main.name: Aakash Neve
main.bio: I am an analytics professional with around three years of experience in management consulting and a demonstrated history of providing data-driven business solutions to clients across various domains and geographies. I strive to provide high-quality solutions while creating a culture of excellence, motivation, and a strong value system. I love exploring, learning new skills, and looking at opinions from diverse perspectives. Feel free to connect and reach me out!
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to fill the below form and I will get in touch with you shortly :)

resume.skillmessage: My work as a Decision/ Business Analyst has trained me to leverage following tools and technology to solve the business problems and conduct the analytical operations.

education.degree: Master of Science in Business Analytics

description.point: Worked in the Diversity, Equity and Inclusion sub-committee to ensure all the programs are inclusive of the people coming from diverse backgrounds and promote equity in all human and non-human entities

Worked part-time as a Program Coordinator with the Center for International Relations & Cultural Leadership Exchange at University of Washington to organize and run end-to-end operations of several large-scale cultural exchange and welcome programs for international undergraduate and graduate students of the university

Worked with Novo-Nordisk in collaboration with Electrical and Computer Engineering Department at University of Washington to make an end-to-end product for data collection and detection of Alzheimer's disease in early stage using patient gate data and track its progression

Worked with Calligo in collaboration with Foster School of Business at University of Washington to analyze the flight data to predict flight cancellations and develop targeted customer promotion strategies, assisting clients to reduce cancellations and make marketing decisions

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electrical Engineering

description.point: Worked as a Training and Placement (T&P) Coordinator for 2019 batch. As a T&P coordinator, worked closely with company representatives and students for the organisation and management of placement drives on campus.
Participated in a 10-hour mathematics research-a-thon on "Optimization of Traffic" where the vehicle traffic was modeled using differential equations.
Secured a national finalist position in Datamaze -  a data analytics competition organized by FMS, Delhi amongst premier engineering and management institutions of India.
Saved ~$30M and 100+ hours of manual effort by designing a SQL logic to automate financial reporting of B2B hiring and learning bundled products

Boosted cross sell business outcomes for LinkedIn's Learning products world-wide by setting up financial plan, reporting and communicating insights to sales leadership, supporting a $60M target annual achievement
Achieved a 2% QoQ reduction in controllable churn by setting targets for CSMs, enhancing customer retention
Led global headcount planning and reconciliation across 6 regions, collaborating with 50+ sales leaders and ensuring accurate alignment for LinkedIn's FY25 financial and operational targets
Assisted CEO to drive strategic conversations with world leaders in APEC summit resulting in 5+ major renewal contracts worth $120M
Designed and conducted the biggest bench-marking survey in the US pharmaceutical space for 79 companies and shared the insights on pay benchmarks to senior leadership
Strategized and developed a framework that helped the Incentive Compensation leaders to effectively manage the end-to-end sales contests across six business units
Automated the marketing segmentation of health-care practitioners across geographies by leveraging machine learning techniques such as K-nearest neighbors with ~90% accuracy
Enhanced the compensation model for 2k+ pharmaceutical sales representatives by creating Excel models and Monte Carlo simulations, saving the budget of more than $0.5 million for every $100 million
Led the training and on-boarding of associates on live projects and facilitated certification programs for 150+ participants across the globe
Estimated $275 million worth of combined sales impact of competitors on the world’s largest retailer

Built a linear regression-based market share driver model on R and a dashboard using Tableau to identify the threat index of a competitor's presence on sales and assist leadership in strategizing counter plans

projects.title: Language translation of PDF locally using Python
Unlocking Success in the Littlefield Simulation

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Aakash must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
